Changelog
=========

2.1 (2012-10-13)
----------------
* Fixed GS imports of portlets.xml which include a BlingPortet definition.  BugzID: 18190

2.0 (2012-02-09)
----------------
* Added ZCML directive to define custom views for BlingPortlets

1.1 (2011-07-11)
----------------
* Description now displays on first bling item.  BugzID: 5291
* Read More link is now correct on the first bling item.  BugzID: 5576

1.0 (2011-03-09)
----------------
* Created this product
